price: 17. Mpe tosilaki kotia kurani ezala pete na bokundoli, boye ezali na moto oyo akoki kokanisa?
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ يَسَّرۡنَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ لِلذِّكۡرِ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: walaqad yassarnā al-qur'āna lildhik'ri fahal min muddakirin
